---
title: "Untitled"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
n <- 100
df <- data.frame(
    a = 1:n,
    b = sample( letters, n, replace = TRUE ),
    c = seq.Date( as.Date( "2000-01-01" ), by = 1, length.out = n ),
    d = seq.POSIXt( as.POSIXct( "2000-01-01 10:00:00" ), by = 1000, length.out = n ),
    e = setattr( 1:n, "class", "ITime" ),
    f = sample( c( TRUE, FALSE ), n, replace = T ),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
write_rcsv( df, "READMEfiles/test.rcsv", strings.convert = TRUE )
rcsv::write_rcsv( df, "READMEfiles/test2.rcsv", strings.convert = FALSE )
```

```{r}
system( 'head READMEfiles/test.rcsv' )
```


```{r}
subset(
    file.info( paste0( "READMEfiles/test", c( ".rcsv", "2.rcsv" ) ) ),
    select = 1
)
```


```{r}
ret <- read_rcsv( "READMEfiles/test.rcsv" )
ret2 <- rcsv::read_rcsv( "test2.rcsv" )
```
